channel.title: Air Conditioning on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Air Conditioning on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: The Air of Superiority
item.description: Today in Tedium: The 1902 invention of air conditioning has long been hailed as one of the most important inventions of the 20th century, one that has forever changed the way we live. But as we hit an era when robots become more human than ever and try to steal our jobs, I find myself wonderingâ€”what can we learn from the additional freedom that air conditioning gave us? Sure, it improved our society by making temperature something that we can control, but what about the problems that came with this cool breeze?
